sqlQuery.name: AllVariables
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, ag.stable_id as attribute_id, EntityTypeTerm.source_id as entity_type_id from eda.AttributeGraph ag, eda.Attribute a, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, sres.OntologyTerm EntityTypeTerm where ag.stable_id = a.stable_id and a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and etg.entity_type_id = EntityTypeTerm.ontology_term_id

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, ag.stable_id as attribute_id, EntityTypeTerm.source_id as entity_type_id, ag.display_name as attribute_name, ag.provider_label, dsp.display_name as study_name, etg.display_name as entity_type from eda.AttributeGraph ag, eda.Attribute a, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, eda.Study s, sres.OntologyTerm EntityTypeTerm, apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where ag.stable_id = a.stable_id and a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and ag.study_id = s.study_id and s.stable_id = etg.study_stable_id and etg.entity_type_id = EntityTypeTerm.ontology_term_id and sd.dataset_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id

sqlQuery.name: Values
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, av.attribute_stable_id as attribute_id, EntityTypeTerm.source_id as entity_type_id, av.string_value as value from eda.AttributeValue av, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, sres.OntologyTerm EntityTypeTerm where av.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and etg.entity_type_id = EntityTypeTerm.ontology_term_id and av.number_value is null and av.date_value is null and lower(av.string_value) != 'yes' and lower(av.string_value) != 'no'
